Shadows.description: Blurred, immaterial silhouette resembling a human shadow. In the dark, it can take the form of loved ones or trusted individuals. Moves stealthily, inducing anxiety and strengthening the hero's fears.
Shadows.skills: Can transform into someone dear to you, strong hit to the hero's mental state

Statue.description: Stone figure resembling an ancient deity or warrior, holding fragments of broken bodies as weapons
Statue.skills: Throws body parts when approached within 2 tiles

Shadow Specter.description: Translucent entity with a changing shape. Resembling black smoke with bright yellow eyes

Shadow Leech.icon: Long, writhing creature resembling a giant worm

Rat.description: Small rodent with red eyes and a long tail. Its teeth gleam with venomous saliva

Hungry Wraith.description: A ghostly figure with bony hands and a face with gaping mouth, seemingly screaming forever

Defiled Cultist.description: A man with deformed facial features, dressed in cultist robes, holding an old, bloodstained staff

Dead Tree.description: An ancient tree resembling a terrifying, humanoid figure with hollow eyes. Its roots move like snakes, and the bark is marked with traces of blood.

Poisoned Monk.description: Emaciated, almost skeletal figure in a dirty, tattered habit. Hands covered in sores, eyes vacant, mouth twisted into a sinister grin.

Root Guardian.description: Gigantic living root with spiky vines, covered in juices resembling blood

Fire Choker.description: Demon with burning skin, long arms, and red eyes
Fire Choker.skills: Flaming grasp and flame tongues (spiritual power)

Rotting Flesh.description: Large creature made of decaying body parts
Rotting Flesh.skills: Breaks into pieces that explode + explodes with double power upon death

Winged Nightmare.description: Large, winged monster with wings resembling torn skin
